description.value:
A fusillade of jagged splinters flies from you. Creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] take @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -1)/2)+1)d4[piercing],(floor((@actor.level -1)/2)+1)d4[persistent,bleed]|traits:area-damage] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC.

Level (+2) Each type of damage increases by 1d4.
